name: Tank Destroyers
description:
This Game was made for the Trijam #139!

This is a small Demo where you have to beat the Boss!

---MAJOR KNOWN BUGS---

  • You can't die

There will be a Windows Download when the bugs are fixed!

Art, Coding - made by myself

Soundeffects - made by myself using SFXR

Soundtrack - from SVL's RPG Music Pack
